item.title: PPMS Monitor and Control v1.11.2.28
item.description:
Product: PPMS Monitor and Control v1.11.2.28
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Fri, 06 Feb 2026 22:19:59 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Monitor and Control application inheritng from Instrument Framework and SMO
- Log instrument status to the PGSQL database.
- UI and API for controlling magnet field, temperature, and rotator angle (PPMS2 only)

Release Notes: [1.11.2]
- build with pgsql/3.12.1.15 (hotfix for connection key)
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: LEIDEN API v0.0.3.6
item.description:
Product: LEIDEN API v0.0.3.6
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Fri, 06 Feb 2026 22:19:41 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Tools used by LevyLab to interact with Leiden Cryostats

Front Panel (FP) API:
- pushButton({Start, 3He, 4He, Normal, Recovery, Auto, Reset, LED Test})
- setMode({Auto Off, Start, Condense 3He, Condense 4He, Normal Circulation, Recovery})
- getMode()

Temperature Control (TC) API:
- getTemperature()
- setTemperature()
- setHeater()
- getHeater()

Release Notes: [0.0.3]
- build with pgsql/3.12.1.15 (hotfix for connection key)
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: LV-Data-PGSQL v3.12.1.15
